# MagicScroll

## [Demo](https://mudin.github.io/magic-scroll/)

![Demo](https://mudin.github.io/magic-scroll/magic-scroll.gif)

## Install

```
  npm i magic-scroll.js -S
```

## Usage

```
let magicScroll = new MagicScroll({
  target: document.querySelector(".scroll-view.after"),
  speed: 80,
  smooth: 12
});
```
